info.author: Matt Copperwaite
info.description:
# CharDiff

Take 2 strings as arguments and show the difference between them

## Installation

    pip3 install chardiff

## Usage

    python3 -m chardiff "string1" "string2" --color red

## License

info.html_description:
# CharDiff

Take 2 strings as arguments and show the difference between them

## Installation

pip3 install chardiff

## Usage

python3 -m chardiff “string1” “string2” –color red
